Package controller

Class AppointmentScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.AppointmentScreenController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddAppointmentController
public class AppointmentScreenController extends Object
AppointmentScreen class contains methods for filtering appointments by week, month, or all. Also contains methods to verify overlapping appointments.
